scripts.tex:template: hackmyresume BUILD zezin-en.json TO out/resume.latex -t themes/awesome
scripts.tex:template-pt_BR: hackmyresume BUILD zezin-pt_BR.json TO out/resume.latex -t themes/awesome
scripts.tex:pt_BR: find out/latex -name '*.tex' | xargs sed -i 's/Present/Atual/g; s/Skills/Habilidades/g; s/Education/Educação/g; s/Experience/Experiência/g; s/Languages/Idiomas/g; s/Side Projects/Projetos Open-Source/g'
scripts.pdf: npm run clean && npm run tex:template && npm run tex:compile && npm run pdf:copy -- cv.pdf
scripts.pdf-pt_BR: npm run clean && npm run tex:template-pt_BR && npm run tex:pt_BR && npm run tex:compile && npm run pdf:copy -- pt-BR.pdf
scripts.html:build: hackmyresume BUILD zezin-jsr-en.json TO out/resume.html -t themes/jsonresume-theme-slick
scripts.html:build-pt_BR: hackmyresume BUILD zezin-jsr-pt_BR.json TO out/resume.html -t themes/jsonresume-theme-slick
scripts.html:translate: find out -name '*.html' | xargs sed -i 's/Work Experience/Experiência de Trabalho/g; s/Skills/Habilidades/g; s/Education/Educação/g; s/Languages/Idiomas/g; s/Side Projects/Projetos/g'
scripts.html: npm run clean && npm run html:convert -- zezin-en.json TO zezin-jsr-en.json && npm run html:add_conversion -- zezin-en.json zezin-jsr-en.json && npm run html:build && npm run html:copy -- index.html
scripts.html-pt_BR: npm run clean && npm run html:convert -- zezin-pt_BR.json TO zezin-jsr-pt_BR.json && npm run html:add_conversion -- zezin-pt_BR.json zezin-jsr-pt_BR.json && npm run html:build-pt_BR && npm run html:translate && npm run html:copy -- pt-BR.html
scripts.all: npm run html && npm run html-pt_BR && npm run pdf && npm run pdf-pt_BR
